name: Blocks (itch) (vrgeorge0047)
description:
Presenting before you "Blocks".

With Blocks, we are bringing back to life the classic retro game of sliding custom shaped blocks and earning points. 

This is a simple and easy, yet addictive and pleasurable game, which can be played by people of all ages.

This is a completely free game, and you don't have to purchase anything.

Master your game play skills.

Work in progress

1. Share with friends through social media

2. Multi player options
